item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 23, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

10. Rust, C++, and Python trends in jobs on Hacker News (February 2025) (95 points | 67 comments)

12. PropRise (YC S23) Is Hiring Engineer #1 ( | hide)

15. Pee If You Want to Go Deeper (2021) (107 points | 32 comments)

22. It is no longer safe to move our governments and societies to US clouds (803 points | 489 comments)
23. Despite sticker prices, the real cost of getting a degree has been going down (38 points | 83 comments)
24. Ask for no, don't ask for yes (2022) (550 points | 248 comments)
25. Penn to reduce graduate admissions, rescind acceptances amid research cuts (253 points | 510 comments)
26. CEO Simulator: Startup Edition (175 points | 43 comments)

28. Thailand to Cut Power to Myanmar Scam Hubs (111 points | 30 comments)
